briefTitle: The Mycotic Ulcer Treatment Trial II: A Randomized Trial Comparing Oral Voriconazole vs Placebo
officialTitle: The Mycotic Ulcer Treatment Trial II: A Randomized Trial Comparing Oral Voriconazole vs Placebo
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if the addition of oral voriconazole to topical treatment regimens results in lower rates of perforation in severe fungal corneal ulcers.

primaryOutcome.measure: Incidence of Perforation or Therapeutic Penetrating Keratoplasty

commonTop: AST or ALT elevated to twice upper limit of normal
Ulcer not healing after 6 weeks of therapy
